configuration.stem: Complete the description of sexual reproduction.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Read the descriptions of the reproductive processes described for each animal.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Most animals reproduce sexually. Sexual reproduction ensures that genetic variation is maintained in a population.

configuration.paragraph: Sexual reproduction is the process utilized by <<Option1>> animals. To reproduce sexually, an animal <<Option2>> energy to find a mate. The main advantage of sexual reproduction is that it <<Option3>> genetic variation in the population.
